title: The Ancient
description: In a villa, where boundaries are made of death, one young man steps across the line.The servant demands obedience to a creed carved in stone.The Ancient comes…Family is a privilege afforded only to the smiths of each villa. Banin, by choosing his bride in secret, jeopardizes not only that privilege, but the safety of his entire villa. He’s ready to pay, but does he know the cost?
author: Wendy   Wilson
